name: pastel_geometry
description: White card on pastel background. Vertical pills on right edge.
signature_elements: Vertical pills on right edge with varying heights
Consistent pill width, heights: short → medium → tall → medium → short
extra_css: .content-card { background: var(--bg-card); border-radius: 16px; box-shadow: 0 4px 30px rgba(0,0,0,0.06); padding: clamp(2rem, 4vw, 4rem); position: relative; } .pills-container { position: absolute; right: -12px; top: 50%; transform: translateY(-50%); display: flex; flex-direction: column; gap: 6px; } .pill { width: 8px; border-radius: 4px; } .pill-sm { height: 24px; } .pill-md { height: 40px; } .pill-lg { height: 56px; }
